well wel well i havent updated in a very very long time there really isnt much to write about. My summer is alright its feels more like summer now even thought its like the last week of july but its good i have nothing really to complain about. Well yesterday i went to Megan's house haha what fun we havent had one of our sleepovers in a looong time so it was fun we didnt get to go int he pool but oh welll maybe next time haha. Well we went on the trampoline and what does it do as soon as we are in it yeahh it rains....of course! i didnt mind i love the rain it was like swimming on the trampoline haha then we rented camp ha sucha good movie. VLAD! that was so funny omg megan he defiantly would be a really good boyfriend ((ten MInutes later)) omg he cheats on three people alright NEVERMIND! haha omg he's gay he's gayyy okay nevermind he just likes to please people haha whatta a great movie we should have gone to theatre camp =/ then big brother thats my show and summerland omg like my new favorite show ohh my god. Then we watched the butterfly effect that was an amazing movie im still thinking about it we almost turned it off becuase megan was scared out of her mind but i wanted to watch it but megan then liked it it all worked out. The movie realy makes you think. LIke its honestly crazy how much it makes you think haha. everyone  should watch it Then we listened to busted all night long and that was the best part im soso excited they are coming here! woot woot all you people will love them trust me haha alright well yeahhhh um i think this entry has gone on enough have a nice day =) haha xo <3

omg i have not updated i dont know i sorta just didnt feel the wanr to ill give you a short summary =)

here it goes:
- school is out and its summer which is absolutley lovely!
- i failed my finals and im okay with it becuase i have come to the     conclusion  that i am a total dumbass haha i really am
- i went to rebecca's house with brittany and chris and we made a video and i had an amazing time and i love her house THUNDERRR THIGHS!
- i have a job and im actually doing pretty well and im very proud of myself!

- spent the weekend at my aunts and it wasnt too bad it was actually fun
- i had so much fun with my brother and 3rd grader cousin and it made my whole week when the pointed out that this kid was looking at me ahhh haha it was the funniest thing and no surprise he was ooglay becuase i myself am ooglay and im a magnet for ooglay boys what can i say
- i got my pictures back from last week! 

alright well thats about it update tomorrow <3

omg this is the last week of freshman year how crazy is that im not complaining mos defiantly not but its like whoaaaa i finished a year in high school already ever since i was little i dreamed about being in high school and im actually like in it...yeahh im very sentimental

well my weekend was sorta boring it was like one of those do notthing summery weekend but i sorta like those type of things. but i went to CROTON_ON_HUDSON! becuase i had a dentist appt haha but we went through where we lived and oh my goodness i was excited yeahh scenic drive  hehe =) my apartment looked so beautiful haha it realy did i sorta miss that place but its good for the memories ya know

well today was the last day C but it was sorta boring anyways well im gonna go xoxo

i only had to go to two blocks ahhh god that was great and they were esay too spanish and gym! haha score well i had a dr appt. and then i went to COSTCO MY FAVORITE STORE EVERR! haha if i go there by myself i good honestly spend 1000s. haha whatta dork! then i had madd homework even though i wasnt in any of the classes and then i had a habiat dinner and MIllbrook omg what a pretty country club i wish i was rich so i could join haha

Well today was also one of my last learning centers ahh clark learning center block 7 you guys are amazing! xo

ahhhhh i cant wait tonight is the opening night madd excited! Everyone should go see it!

okay ready set, rant! 

well, well, well my day was good but just one little thing got really pissed off. Well there is this kid right i thought he was pretty nice i mean hes one of those perfect rich kids i mean he sorta annoyed me but not that much, but so he is in habitat and i wanted to go to a build this saturday and so my friend told me he has the slips and so i asked him and he goes " Sarah you cant go, you are in Les Mis, umm its a really late one we are leaving at 4 and we wont get back until 5" and i dont like confratations so i was like whatevr i walked away and i wa spissed he has the ner ve to say that and hes in the play you FRAKING DUMBASS! if i cant make it you cant either. So iw as like i just love how he thinks ims o dumb and i can read people really well so dont waste your time, if you abuse your position you shouldnt be in it and one day i hope i get caught in your own lies becuase ya derserve it and so i went to mr ayers and asked if icouyld have a slip and i asked if me being in Les Mis  was a problem and he said absolutley not. so you were wrong and i thik that was unfair of you and i cant wait to see you staurday ahah im gonna be like on friday we'll ill see you habitat . omg i probaly sound horrible, but what he did was horrible thats extremely rude and dont treat people like that if you dont like me thats fine but dont when you have a role in something dont control actiosn with your feelings. oOo i also loved hw he was so nice to me afterwards f you i dont like and this day ha changed my opinon on you. alright theres my rant, umm i hope i dont sound bitchy eck! 

minus that crape today was awesome. xo wish me luck tonight woot woot

i havent written in a long time ahhh i dont like that! haha like i need to write my feeligns down but since i have play practice and stuff its hard for me to make time but i will start to make time, i will.

alright the first thing i have to say is thank the flipping lord it is friday!
*ive had soOo much work
*miss ozeri gave me a C+ becuase she says i didnt hand something in which i did
and i need to take a breather from school right now, i just need two days off like  sometimes i just cant handle the pressure dont get me wrong i love school and actually like this year a lot and i dont want it to end like go too fast but i want all this workload to stop i hae good teachers but right now  its like the teachers arent human, they like dont have feelings right now, well at least my teachers dont.

I suggest you all listen to them even if you dont like that music, like you soOo will fall in love with it <3 i love ya! Sarah <3

hey! well i havent updated again ive been kind abusy and stuff well let seees

Wednesday:
-it was pretty good, but i had practice until 6 but i left at 5 becuas ei thought it ended at five and i dont know istarted to feel all upset becuase i dont know if i wanan do it i mean it takes up my time but, then it will be worth it like i really dont know i guess ill stick up with it. That actually was pretty much the big event of that day i mean it was a good day but nothing speical.

Today:
it was acutally really good, math was fun becuase all katie and i did was talk so i mean like that was good. Then Chorale we did nothing becuase everyone in the music department expect for the freshman chorale, of course we cant go went to virginia beach so like we had a sub and had to wait for everyone to leave, and kristie parry is an amazing singer i just have to add that i mean shes breatakingly good! haha OoO goodness, Then world themes was actually good miss ozeri wasnt in a bad mood omg surprise surprise, but jake made the class haha miss ozeri was like alex you are going to be docked and then jake shouts out docked is worse then being benched haha it was so funny hmm well i hope its funny, but if you not ya had to be there. Then english kinda boring kinda not, but dan fell alseep and it was just funny haha, then onstage was good i suppose we read the script fromg gypsy which i love. Then  bio was good but mr v wantther so we had a sub which was kinda blah-ish. And well that was pretty much my day.

my title i like it haha, like i m watching hook which is in my top ten i mean awesoem movie, but the little girl was singing it and i thought it was real pretty so i type it in. ANd, at this moment i cant really relate to it. becuase you feel so alone soemtiem sbut i guess your not. There will always be soemone that will feel the same way or gone through something like it. Well i think ive typed enough, um uh yea i did <3 Sarah

i got a new layout....made by the amazing Kaitlyn Crookstoon

well this weekend was good, saturday i hung out with my mommy and got a frappacino that was a plus. Today, i went to my cousin's lax game and then my uncle, aunt, and cousin went to our house for a bit. It was good. You know i just found out that lax means lacrosse like a month, ago what a dork!!! 

Well I've decided every weekend im gonna like make a reflection, you know like ive realized i need to write down a lot of stuff to figure who i am i know what i am, but not i want to see what my attributes are and what i need to work on. I've realized that im growing up and im realizing thats im changing, and I want to know what my changes are. This may sound corny and stuff but i think the journal will really help me become a better person becuase ill get comments sometimes and ill realize like me in away you know. Well i would write more, but the parentals are in the room and yea so i cant be on for long becuase yea i cant well im gonna go watch that Britney Spears movie, Brave New Girl or something woot woot! <3 Sarah

today was awesome...score! I got my braces off in the morning =) hallelujah, had double bio, got an 85 on my Bio test that i thought i failed, went to visit my nanny, went to the JV Mall, the mall that like i grew up in haha, got a jean skirt, had chinese food, and the best of all i got velvety pink flip flops and FLIPPING CARE BEAR FLIP FLOPS WOHOO!!!! yes today was quite good, i hope a good day was had by all <3 Sarah

hey! well yea i haven't updated in a very very very long time! Well i was real busy becuase my bestest friend in the whole world Margeaux was here, and so i didnt have any time to update. Then i had play practice and stuff but i have to update more. Well i'm on vacation and he doesn't feel like it we are going back on thursday like wtf i hate our school system and its more complex then you think they really dont care about their students and its way more deep then making us take snow days. I kinda cant say but i'll sum it up...... they care about money and reputation, and sometimes dont do whats best for certain students and yea at this moment i dont like them! but i dont know i havent done anything for break becuase i need rest im soOo tired and stressed but like now im in that crappy mood, that is defiantly indescribable i mean like im happy and my regular self at one moment and then im all cranky and upset the next and i dont like it. I just won't think aout it....maybe that will make it go away. Well im gonna go watch Clueless woot woot! <3

i havent updated in like what two days? well i was sick so nothing happened so yea and today i went to school it was actually pretty good it felt like forver today tho becuase we had those damned capt pratice well tomorrow i get out at 11:20 and my bestest friend is coming ahhhh werd! Well i fell mucho mucho special becuase my homeslice Katie Kabot left me messages werd to that! haha *DOING THE CHOP AND HE ROBOT* haha we are soOo cool i mean i sware haha!I just came home from my brothers fith grade play im like such a stage sister haha i was having more fun then him but like thats the best thing fifth grade honestly it is ahh those parkway memoreis haha well GOOD JOB BROTHER JEREMIAH WOOT WOOT! well i think ive gone on enough haha talk to you later babes <3 Sarah

well today was alright i guess i feel real sick ugh and the capt test stuff really pissed me off! I mean this week honestly has no point at all to it we should be able to leave like the juniors and seniors becuase we dont have any tests ya know but whatever i cant change it. Also something really pissed me off today but im not gonna mention it becuase i really dont wanan remind myself of it. The only thing that was good today was that Katie and I made up two dance moves for when we get good grades on tests! haha woot woot! so that was my day im gonna go watch the inferno mwah <3 Sarah

i am so pleased with myself i cleaned my freaking room! like i threw so much crape out that ive had since i was six it was crazy i cant believe i did it now i just have to clean out my draws uh oh well if i can do my bed and closet i can do the draws! haha well i feel like i've been writing too much so im gonna try and make things short ya know not everything has to be so detailed but sleepless in seattle is on ahh one of my top tens! it's the best movie i wish my life was like that like the love stuff yea well maybe someday huh probaly not and that kid jonah, meg ryan, and tom hanks are soOo cute! haha ahhh well im gonna enjoy my movie <3 Sarah

hey! well i couldnt update yesterday because my parents were going psycho  on me but whatever. I mean i love my parents they're awesome i actually do have a pretty good relationship with them but sometimes i just want to like smack them! but i'm lucky with what i have i guess that part of growing up getting yelled at your parents for no apparent reason. I don't like it but oOo well i have to deal with it.

Well today was madd hectic omg! Well we had a sub for English and world themes so we like did nothing, and nothing special happened. Third i had a bio learning center with emily so we like were gonna go to Clark but decided not to and so we got a pass from miss rubin and we went to get soemthing to eat, but emily decided not too haha but i got my big hot chocolate =) haha my third one this week woot woot! Then i actually studied for bio and stuff since im gonna like fail. Then spanish was boring like usual. Onstage was pretty good sarah jessica and I praticed our piece but we didn't know it was lunch for like five minutes haha then today got hectic. Lunch was alright, i just ate with melanie and we walked around, and we witnessed a screaming fight! omg like my first fight it wasnt so bad i guess, jusy loud screaming this girl was upset that this other girl was talking about her, or osmething silly like that. Then we had the bio test it wasnt that hard so hopefully i did well.Well when i finished i went to clark to go to my locker and changed into my capris, well long story short i wanted to wear a skirt my mom wouldnt let me out of the house, and i was bad and brought the skirt to school but i wanted to wear that skirt! So i'm walking down and as soon as im in the student center i hear someone scream oOo shit! And so i walked and stopped and I looked and people were running like the security guards and other janitors and Jenna was walking past and we were like omg what happened and we saw a guy on the floor whpo was a janitor and we thought he fell down well then Jenna asked me to go to the student activites but it was closed and one of the security was just coming out and let us drop the hting she had to drop off. Then we realized this guy had a heart attack or something becuase they called the ems and was like there is an emergency get over here and we saw a guy holing up his head and saying come on breathe dont give up on us! It was so scary and we were like all scared becuase we just witnessed a janitor having a heart attack  or something i mean thats real scary. So we walked back to bio and told Mr V and we told him and everyone was like omg and so i was like all scared i had that like you know scary shakey feeling in your stomach oh i hate that, but we got let out early like five minuets and we saw the guy get pulled into the ems but he was sitting so i guess he was doing much better then we saw him. But so the bus was good, then i went home and took a nap until um 9:30 oops! But i dont feel so hott so yea that was my day

hectic right...see i told you! haha well leave a comment if you want to! <3 Sarah

uhh the thing just showed me my journal and it posted the revised when and the other typo one haha ummm why did that happen? Well if you know um leave a comment I guess alright nighty night and sweet dreams <3

hey! well today was pretty good it went by reall fast! haha well we went to the Bronx Zoo today WHAT UP! it was alright, i mean it was good it could have been better but whatever im not complaining i go to go to the zoo! Well the morning was really good Kristie was very excited haha she's so funny and so i got hot chocolate and the cup wouldnt shut so i needed assistance! haha well then we found out that mr v separated Katie and I from Kristie talk about ewww but it was alright becuase we were on the same bus and so then we all got a piece of jolt gum! haha joy and then we found that its actually bad it made all of us tired its suppose to make you hyper!
